DOC.brief_summary: The aim of the study is to investigate the efficacy of different dosing and scheduling of Nolvadex in preventing gynecomastia/mastalgia induced by Casodex 150 mg monotherapy in patients with prostate cancer.
DOC.brief_title: Two Different Regimens of Nolvadex in Preventing Gynecomastia Induced by Casodex 150 mg in Patients With Prostate Cancer
DOC.criteria: Histologically confirmed prostate cancer Locally advanced prostate cancer patients suitable for Casodex 150 mg monotherapy Age > 75 yrs No metastatic disease (M1). No presence of gynaecomastia and/or mastalgia at screening No therapy with medications able to provoke gynaecomastia and/or mastalgia within 6 months of trial entry.
